data.name: Privacy.AnyChanges
data.value: W_Any changes to this privacy policy will apply to you and your data immediately. If these changes affect how your personal data is processed, we will let you know.

data.name: Privacy.ChangesToThisPolicy
data.value: W_Changes to this policy

data.name: Privacy.Complaints
data.value: W_Complaints

data.name: Privacy.DefraAsDataProcessor
data.value: W_Defra is acting as the ‘data processor’ for the personal data being collected through the “large producers on the ‘report packaging data’ service”.

data.name: Privacy.DefraRespects
data.value: W_Defra respects your personal privacy when responding to access to information requests, but we may have to share information when necessary to meet the statutory requirements of the Environmental Information Regulations 2004 and the Freedom of Information Act 2000.

data.name: Privacy.DefraWillCollectYour
data.value: W_We will collect your:

data.name: Privacy.DefraWillKeep
data.value: W_We will keep your personal data for 7 years in line with the requirements of the Collection & Packaging Reforms (CPR) programme.

data.name: Privacy.DefraWillOnly
data.value: W_Defra will only transfer your personal data to another country that is deemed adequate for data protection purposes.

data.name: Privacy.DefraWillShare
data.value: W_We will share the personal data collected under this privacy notice with the environmental regulators and the scheme administrator. We do this to provide a digital service as part of the Collection & Packaging Reforms (CPR) programme.
